title: Muzili Smart Fitness Band IPX7 Waterproof Fitness Tracker Watch Pedometer Distance Calorie Counter Sleep Monitor Call Message Alert 10 Alarm Clock for Men Women Boys Girls
description: [ All-day Activity Tracking ] This Muzili fitness band can collect your activity data such as steps taken, distance traveled, calorie burned, activity duration and running data. Just find this data on “VeryFitPro”APP or band. Note: This model does NOT contain Heart Rate Monitor and you need firstly download the App by scanning QR code in the user guide or Google Play to connect the band with your phone.

[ Sleep Monitor and 10 Silent Alarms ] The smart band can automatically track your sleep duration and consistency with comprehensive analysis of sleep quality data including light sleep and deep sleep. The band will vibrate to wake you up and never disturb others. Add up to 10 alarms in the App at a time for all-day schedule.

[ Call and Message Notification] The fitness tracker can vibrate to inform you of incoming calls, SMS messages, E-mails, calendar, SNS such as Twitter, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Linkedin, Wechat. It support reject the call by band directly when you are not convenient. Never miss any important calls or messages with this fitness band.

[ Anti-Lost and Find Phone Function ] When Muzili smart band disconnects from your smart phone’s Bluetooth, it will vibrate to alert you immediately which can keep your phone from being stolen at the range of Bluetooth connection. (Bluetooth range: no more than 5m)

[ Wider Compatibility and Easy USB Charge] Muzili fitness tracker compatible with Android 4.4 or above, IOS 7.1 or above(not for iPad or Tablet). Note: All 115U smart band are not compatible with Samsung Galaxy j1, j2, j3, j4, j5, j7, j9. Take off the both side of wristband and you can see the USB charging port. Plug the USB charging port into charging, red light indicates charging. 1-2 charging can support 7 days using. We provide 12 months warranty.
